lenders.name: Lorna
lenders.occupational_info:
Lorna Li's Biography

Lorna Li is an online marketer with a passion for helping green businesses, nonprofits, and social entrepreneurs with social media marketing.

In a previous life before online marketing, Lorna spent 10 years in the nonprofit sector working on programs involving indigenous cultural preservation, environmental sustainability, and social entrepreneurship. Since nonprofits and social entrepreneurs usually have limited resources, Lorna is a pro with marketing on a shoestring budget.

Lorna likes to assist nonprofits, green companies and social activists with planning their social media strategy. Lorna can often be seen at Bay Area tech events, eco-conscious festivals, or in the Amazon Rainforest.

 Green Marketing for Nonprofits, Green Entrepreneurs, and Social Entrepreneurs

Lorna Li blogs at Green Marketing 2.0, her personal blog created to help entrepreneurs, activists, and nonprofits use web based tools to raise awareness of and build community around their worthy causes. She is also is the founder of Green Marketing TV a blog that features videos, news, tutorials, and information intended to inspiring entrepreneurs to join in the green economy. Green marketing generally refers to 2 things 1) the marketing of products and services that are environmentally amicable 2) marketing that is supprotable ie. uses recycled paper, soy based inks, green web hosting, etc. Because green marketing can be so generally interpreted, Green Marketing TV will look at all points of green marketing, from green business marketing to environmental marketing to social cause marketing.

Connect with Lorna Li

Feel free to connect with Lorna Li on Twitter, Facebook, YouTube or LinkedIn, or subscribe to Lorna Li's Friendfeed

Hobbies / Interests
environmental sustainability, green building, green business, green economy, green marketing, green tech, social entrepreneurs, nonprofits, online marketing, ppc, search engine marketing, seo, sem, social media, travel, yoga

Doing Good Like Water
Not asking for anything in return,

lenders.name: VanBlessed
lenders.loan_because:
25$ is not really much and I am sure my money will come back in some time.
GIVING money means that there is an emergency situation and that some people need help.
LENDING money means that there is an every-day life problem that requires more money: once the problem is gone, you can give back the money you used and keep on living your life.
I give or lend money because it's a little effort for my bank account, and because in the future I could be that person in need.
Also, it's good for Karma :)
lenders.occupational_info:
